content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (5, 3), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"初手は索敵優先。敵空母はマップ右下付近のため、航空隊で遠方索敵を行い、空母は十分に射程内へ接近させるが露見を避ける距離を保つ。ASQ1とASQ2を右下方向へ同時発艦して広く捜索し、見つけ次第攻撃。ただし発艦目標は空母中心から22以内に設定する必要があるため、空母をやや南東へ移動して索敵範囲を拡大する。まず空母を1マス南東（+1,+0 は(6,3)）移動してから両航空隊を右下方面の遠方座標へ発艦する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":6,"y":3},"launch_target":{"x":26,"y":26}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=6 y=3 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=6 y=2.
launch_target was rejected. x=26 y=26 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=18 y=21.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking":"索敵優先。空母を安全に南東へ移動して航空隊の射程内に広い海域を捜索させる。指定座標は海域上で、航空隊の射程（空母中心から22）内に収める。空母を(6,2)へ移動してから、両航空隊を右下方向の可能な限り遠い海域（例: 空母中心から距離22以内の(24,24)）へ同時発艦し広域索敵する。発見次第攻撃に移る。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":6,"y":2},"launch_target":{"x":24,"y":24}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=24 y=24 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=19 y=20.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking":"空母を海上の安全な位置へ移動して航空隊で右下方向を広域索敵。空母移動は(6,2)。空母を基準に航空隊の射程22内で右下方向の最遠（かつ海域の海上）座標を選ぶ。例として両隊を(19,20)へ発艦し、到達後に敵発見で攻撃に移行。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":6,"y":2},"launch_target":{"x":19,"y":20}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (19, 20) while at (6, 3).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 2), en route to target (6, 2), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (6, 3), outbound toward (19, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"ASQ1を広域索敵へ向かわせた。次はASQ2も同様に右下方面へ発艦して探索範囲を広げ、敵空母発見の確率を高める。空母は索敵到達を最大化するため現状維持で良い（近づきすぎて露見リスクを避ける）。ASQ2をASQ1と別経路で少し外側を探すため(18,21)へ発艦指示。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":{"x":18,"y":21}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (18, 21) while at (6, 3).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 2), en route to target (6, 2), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (8, 7), outbound toward (19, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (6, 3), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"両航空隊を右下へ展開中。空母は現在位置維持でよい。航空隊が索敵を進める間、空母を不用意に前進させると敵に発見されるリスクがあるため静観。次ターンは各航空隊の到達予測を見て、もし敵を発見できなければ空母をさらに南東へ1マス（海上）移動して索敵範囲を拡大する準備をする。今回は移動指示不要。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 2), en route to target (6, 2), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (10, 11), outbound toward (19, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (8, 7), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"航空隊が索敵を進めており、敵空母発見までは空母を露見リスクの低い位置に留める。両隊がさらに進出するため、空母は現状維持。航空隊到達後に敵を発見できなければ次に空母を1〜2マス南東へ移動して射程を延ばす計画。今回は指示なしで探索継続。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 2), en route to target (6, 2), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (12, 15), outbound toward (19, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (10, 11), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"両航空隊が索敵を継続中。まだ敵未発見のため、空母は露見リスクを避け現状維持。航空隊は到達地点で索敵後、発見なければ帰還するので、その報告を待ちつつ次ターン以降に空母をさらに南東へ1〜2マス移動して索敵範囲を拡大する準備を継続する。今回は移動・発艦指示なし。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (16, 12) while at (15, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (16, 19) while at (15, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (16, 12) while at (12, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (16, 12) (previously at (17, 13)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (16, 19) (previously at (17, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 2), en route to target (6, 2), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (15, 17), outbound toward (19, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (12, 15), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵航空隊を発見した。敵空母は右下域にいるはずだが、航空隊の位置から空母は更に東〜南東にいる可能性が高い。敵航空隊と交戦しても空母発見に繋がらないため、まずは敵機の方向を追跡して空母位置を割り出すために空母を慎重に南東へ接近させる。距離を詰めすぎて発見されないよう1マスだけ移動(7,2)。同時にASQ1は発見した敵機へ向け攻撃に移れるが、すでに往路で発見しているため進路変更不可。ASQ2は近接しているので(16,12)方面へ向かわせて敵機の進行方向を追跡・確認し、敵空母位置特定を図るためASQ2の発艦目標を(16,12)に変更する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":7,"y":2},"launch_target":{"x":16,"y":12}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=7 y=2 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=6 y=1.
launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking":"敵航空隊を発見したため、空母は慎重に接近して索敵可能範囲を拡大しつつ露見を避ける。海上マスへ1マスだけ移動して南東方向への索敵を強化する。航空隊は既に発艦中で指示不可のため、今回は空母のみ移動指示を出す。（ASQ1/ASQ2は現在の索敵経路継続）","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":6,"y":1},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 12) while at (16, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 12) while at (13, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (14, 17) while at (17, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (13, 17) while at (14, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (15, 12) (previously at (17, 13)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (13, 17) (previously at (17, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 1), en route to target (6, 1), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (18, 19), outbound toward (19, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (14, 19), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵航空隊の位置推移から、敵空母はさらに東〜南東側（マップ右下域）にあると推定される。こちらの航空隊は敵機と接触しているが、敵空母を直接発見していない。敵機の追跡情報を活かすため、空母は慎重に前進して航空隊の索敵到達点をさらに東寄りに伸ばす。安全を考え1マス南（y+1）および1マス東（x+1）へ同時に進めたいが海上判定に注意し、現在(6,1)なので海上の有効例として(7,1)へ1マス東へ移動して索敵圏を拡大する。航空隊は既に展開中のため現行任務を継続させる。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":7,"y":1},"launch_target":null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=7 y=1 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=7 y=0.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking":"敵航空隊の位置から敵空母はさらに東〜南東にいる可能性が高い。自機は発艦中で指示不可のため、空母のみ海上の安全な1マス東進で索敵圏を拡大する。海上の有効座標へ移動する。(7,0)へ移動して航空隊の探索到達点をさらに東へ延伸する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":7,"y":0},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (13, 16) while at (15, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (19, 20).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (15, 12) (previously at (17, 13)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (13, 16) (previously at (17, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 0), en route to target (7, 0), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (19, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (17, 21), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"ASQ1が帰投中、ASQ2はまだ展開中で敵航空隊の位置情報を得ている。敵空母は右下域にいる可能性が高く、次の巡航で空母をさらに南東へ安全に接近して航空隊の索敵範囲を最大化したい。ASQ1は帰投完了後すぐ発艦して別方向を索敵させる予定のため、まず空母を1マス南（y+1）かつ1マス東（x+1）へ無難に移動して索敵圏を拡大する。海上マスを確認の上で(8,0)は海でない可能性があるため安全な海上座標(8,1)へ移動する。発艦はASQ1着艦後に再指示するので今回は空母移動のみ指示。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":8,"y":1},"launch_target":null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=8 y=1 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=8 y=0.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking":"索敵圏を拡大するため空母を海上で東へ移動。海マスを確認し(8,0)が有効なのでそこへ移動。航空隊は展開中のため指示なし。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":8,"y":0},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (14, 14) while at (17, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (18, 21).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (14, 14) (previously at (17, 13)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (13, 16) (previously at (17, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 0), en route to target (8, 0), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (17, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (18, 21), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"両航空隊が帰還中で敵空母は未発見。敵機の移動から空母は依然としてマップ右下寄りと推定される。着艦後すぐに再発艦して別方向を集中索敵し発見を狙う。空母は着艦を待ちつつ現状維持（露見を避ける）。次ターン、両隊着艦後に同時発艦して東〜南東（敵想定位置）を広く探す計画。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 17) while at (15, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (12, 17) while at (15, 12).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (16, 18) while at (16, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (12, 17) while at (16, 17).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (16, 18) (previously at (17, 13)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (12, 17) (previously at (17, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 0), en route to target (8, 0), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (15, 12), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (16, 17), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"両航空隊が着艦中／帰還中で敵空母未だ不明。敵機の分布（BSQ1がやや東寄り、BSQ2がやや中央寄り）から敵空母は引き続き右下域（東〜南東）にいると推定。両隊が補充後、同時に発艦して異なる扇状の目標へ広域索敵し、可能な限り早く敵空母を発見するのが最優先。空母は航空隊の射程を最大化するために慎重に東へ前進するが、露見リスクを避けるため一度に大きくは動かさない。まずは両隊の着艦を待ってから、ASQ1をやや南東寄り（優先索敵ゾーン中央）へ、ASQ2をさらに南東外側（包囲的索敵）へ発艦させる。空母は海上の安全マスへ1マス東進して索敵圏を拡大する。（具体指示：空母を(9,0)へ移動、発艦指示は両隊着艦後に出すため今回は発艦指示なし）","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":9,"y":0},"launch_target":null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=9 y=0 is not on sea.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking":"海マスを確認して空母を東へ慎重に移動し索敵範囲を拡大する。現在(8,0)の東は(9,0)が陸のため無効。代わりにやや南東寄りで海上の有効座標(9,1)へ1マス移動する。航空隊は帰投完了後に同時発艦して右下（東南）を広域索敵する計画。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":9,"y":1},"launch_target":null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=9 y=1 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=10 y=0.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking":"空母の移動は海上マスに限定される。現在(8,0)から移動できる海上の安全な候補として、示唆された(10,0)が海で有効なので、まず空母をそこへ移動して索敵圏を東方向へ拡大する。航空隊は帰投完了後に同時発艦して東〜南東を広域索敵する計画を継続する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":10,"y":0},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵航空隊の報告で敵空母の位置はさらに東〜南東（右下域）に絞れた。両隊は帰投中でまもなく整備完了するはず。空母は現在移動中だが、航路を続けて東へ接近し航空隊の発艦射程を最大化する。海上で安全に進める座標(10,0)への移動を継続し、ASQ1/ASQ2の着艦後は即時同時発艦して東南東方向へ広域索敵（ASQ1はやや内側の（20,18）へ、ASQ2は外側の（21,21）へ）を指示する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":10,"y":0},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵航空隊の位置で敵空母は右下寄りと推定される。両航空隊はまもなく着艦するので、着艦後に即再発艦して別々の扇状エリアを同時索敵し敵空母を早期発見する。空母は現在移動中で射程拡大のため東へ移動を続けるが、陸地回避が必要。今回の指示は航空隊着艦待ちのため無し。ASQ着艦後にASQ1を(20,18)、ASQ2を(21,21)へ発艦予定。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":null}}
